name: Purgatorio Train
description:
Purgatorio train The game has inspiration by The Divine Comedy: Purgatory

The poem was written in the early 14th century. It is an allegory telling of the climb of Dante up the Mount of Purgatory. guided by the guided by the Roman poet Virgil—except for the last four cantos,

Story

There is no story. I just want to know your conscience

How to play

W A S D : Walk

E : Interactive with object 

The picture is a clue 

Paper is a defination of answer

the answer is a Antonym of the sin that you facing

Every rooms has a clue of the last answer

Maker:
